pages.title: Semi-permeable Glass
pages.text: $(italic)For a long time now, those annoying monsters that always appear at night are no longer a threat to you and only serve as a resource supplier, if at all. But that doesn't stop them from pursuing you further. But you spend more time keeping those pesky monsters out of your base than you care to admit. It's a waste of time to even bother with these low-life ruffians. Then you remember the gemstone glass recipe you thought up earlier. With a bit of magical energy, it should be no problem to make it not only transparent for you (not for them!), but also passable. Bonus: If you make it look exactly like regular glass you might even be able to fool your competition. It just needs a tough of magic.$()

Semi-permeable Glass comes in all the gemstone colors that are available to you, including the common glass and it's tinted variant.$(br2)It looks exactly like it's $(l:decoration/gemstone_glass)boring counterpart$(), but has the special property that players can pass through it without problems, while all other creatures bounce off it like a fly off a window.
